rows.Description: Endangerment to life, major property damage, or large customer impact.
Immediate health, safety, or structural risk.
For a continuously beeping smoke alarm.
Non-emergency but potential for future issues.
Non-urgent, can be deferred without significant impact.
Larger repairs or recent deterioration, planned repairs.

rows.TYPE OF REPAIR:
Ceilings
Re-plastering or patch repairs to ceilings
rows.Rechargeable to Customer: If damage is due to customer action
rows.Reportable by Leaseholders & Shared Owne:
No – Sharedowner
Leaseholder – refer to buildings insurance on service now

rows.TYPE OF REPAIR:
Doors
Additional keys / fobs for communal entrance doors
rows.Who is Responsible: Customer but extra keys are usually obtained from Housing team at a charge
rows.Additional for Vulnerable Customers: Customer but extra keys are usually obtained from Housing team at a charge

rows.TYPE OF REPAIR:
Doors
Additional keys / fobs for communal entrance doors
rows.Who is Responsible: Customer but extra keys are usually obtained from Housing team at a charge
rows.Additional for Vulnerable Customers: Customer but extra keys are usually obtained from Housing team at a charge

rows.TYPE OF REPAIR:
Doors
Gain access if keys lost – i.e. force entry & repair or replace lock
rows.Who is Responsible: All customers will be advised to contact locksmith in the first instance. If unable to do this Maintenance Team will attend but customer will be recharged for the visit.
rows.Additional for Vulnerable Customers: All customers will be advised to contact locksmith in the first instance. If unable to do this Maintenance Team will attend but customer will be recharged for the visit.
rows.Rechargeable to Customer: Rechargeable for general needs and vulnerable customers. Recharge may be waivered in exceptional circumstances by Housing team
rows.Reportable by Leaseholders & Shared Owne: No response from Maintenance Team - will be advised to contact locksmith.

rows.TYPE OF REPAIR:
Doors
Gain access if keys lost – i.e. force entry & repair or replace lock
rows.Who is Responsible: All customers will be advised to contact locksmith in the first instance. If unable to do this Maintenance Team will attend but customer will be recharged for the visit.
rows.Additional for Vulnerable Customers: All customers will be advised to contact locksmith in the first instance. If unable to do this Maintenance Team will attend but customer will be recharged for the visit.
rows.Rechargeable to Customer: Rechargeable for general needs and vulnerable customers. Recharge may be waivered in exceptional circumstances by Housing team
rows.Reportable by Leaseholders & Shared Owne: No response from Maintenance Team - will be advised to contact locksmith.

rows.Rechargeable to Customer: Yes - if lock is in working order but customer has lost the key
rows.Reportable by Leaseholders & Shared Owne: No response from Maintenance – will be advised to contact locksmith.
rows.Target Priority:
Critical Emergency
4 hours
(If only one door for access)

rows.Rechargeable to Customer: Yes - if lock is in working order but customer has lost the key
rows.Reportable by Leaseholders & Shared Owne: No response from Maintenance – will be advised to contact locksmith.

rows.TYPE OF REPAIR:
Door
Re-secure front or back door to dwelling
rows.Rechargeable to Customer: If damage is due to customer action
rows.Target Priority:
Critical
Emergency 
4 hours 
- Unable to close shut (door ajar)
- Unable to lock and no chain or deadbolt

rows.TYPE OF REPAIR:
Door
Re-secure front or back door to dwelling
rows.Rechargeable to Customer: If damage is due to customer action
rows.Target Priority:
Emergency 
- Unable to lock but there is a chain

rows.TYPE OF REPAIR:
Door
Re-secure front or back door to dwelling
rows.Rechargeable to Customer: If damage is due to customer action
rows.Target Priority:
Routine 
- Unable to lock but they have a deadbolt which secures it & can access/ exit the property via another door

rows.TYPE OF REPAIR:
Automatic Doors
Repairs to auto doors

Door
Repair or replace defective locks to external doors
rows.Rechargeable to Customer:
If needed as a result of keys being lost or through customer damage.
Free for domestic violence cases (If referred via ASB Team)
rows.Reportable by Intermediate rent: Yes – recharge possible if customer damage
